channel.title: Problem with putting server online <plz help>
channel.description: i am using no-ip to put my server online it seems to b working but nobody can log in except me what do i do[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 04:01:07 PM[/size][hr]10 lookers and no posters?

item.title: Problem with putting server online <plz help>
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

u dont need to port forward for a no-ip server but i suggest u use hamachi, it doesnt lag and everyone can log on easily

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with putting server online <plz help>
item.dc:creator: @Dboi Dboi
item.description:
@Dboi wrote:

Check if you’re Windows FireWall has Exception to your port.

Also see if your Router is Allowing it.
